name: guidelines-implementing-practices-for-resilient-livelihoods-and-risk-management

groups.name: climate-change-adaptation
groups.description: Climate change threatens our ability to ensure global food security, eradicate poverty and achieve sustainable development. Greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions from human activity and livestock are a significant driver of climate change, trapping heat in the earth's atmosphere and triggering global warming.
groups.title: Climate change adaptation and resilience

groups.description:
Between 2005 and 2015, over 700,000 people lost their lives, and approximately 23 million were made homeless, as a result of disasters. The total economic loss was more than US$1.3 trillion.

Reducing risks and strengthening resilience.
groups.name: disaster-risk-reduction-and-disaster-risk-managment
groups.title: Disaster Risk Reduction and Management

groups.name: food-security-and-nutrition
groups.description: The 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development and the UN Decade of Action on Nutrition 2016â€“2025 call on all countries and stakeholders to act together to end hunger and prevent all forms of malnutrition by 2030.
groups.title: Food Security and Nutrition

resources.description: This document provides a guide for designing and implementing communication activities in support of ADRM.
resources.name: Planning communication for agricultural disaster risk management

resources.description: This document provides a detailed explanation and analysis of the FAO Disaster Risk Reduction for Food and Nutrition Security Framework Programme which aims to provide strategic direction to the implementation of disaster risk reduction measures in member countries across the agricultural-related sectors in line with the Hyogo Framework for Action and its five priority areas.
resources.name: Resilient livelihoods disaster risk reduction for food security and nutrition

organization.title: FAO
organization.description: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
organization.name: fao

title: Guidelines: implementing practices for resilient livelihoods and risk management
notes: This dataset contains methodologies and guidelines that will help the user understand how to implement best practices to build resilient livelihoods and manage risk.
